0: Our nachos at the pools actually had liquid cheese like you get at high school football games
The pool was very nice and has several different depths varying from 3ft8 ft throughout with waterfalls and a lazy river
He was an avid boarder and swimmer so was able to tell us the best areas to see the marine life and best places to swim
Just a few short steps away from the pool and you can snorkel at Black Rock an iconic Maui landmark and one of the better beach access snorkeling locations in the islands
Beautiful pool with bar and ocean fronting it
One of my favorite features of the hotel was the pool and beach
I loved the polside poke bowls the best
Also have a rock to jump off into the ocean and sea turtles will swim right through your legs amazing

The beach runs directly alongside the hotel and it was great to be able to swim and snorkel in the very warm Pacific Ocean along with the turtles and we even saw Humpback Whales breaching nearby amazing experience
1: Should offer more lounge chairs around the pool
There were no restaurants or bars and no outside food or drink is allowed at the pool

I guess as we were standing there in the nearly empty lobby looking at the beautiful ocean none of this seemed so off putting I really just wanted to get to the beach and pool we had driven in from Hana that morning and were just glad to be out of the car
You also have to pay for lawn chairs and umbrellas if you want to sit on the beach even a lot of the lawn chairs and cabanas by the pool are only available by rental for 45 a day
This is a nice hotel for families but overpriced in my opinion based on the tiny rooms outdated decor small pool extra cost for amenities like basic beach rentals chairs
We also stayed at Hyat regency down the road Hyat has better rooms and better pools but the beach was better near Sheraton
Chairs by the pool were hard to come by had to pay extra to reserve a cabana by the pool otherwise nothing
Not once besides cocktail server did we see anyone check on pool areaSmal tables next to longe chairs never cleaned and were sticky and dirty from night or weeks before
Adults were drinking in the pool and we encountered several guests staggering to their rooms which was not a good environment for my 10 year old granddaughter
Our biggest disappointment was the pool
